about_the_game:
An intimate tale of two sisters & their tenuous bond. Immerse yourself in this emotional story of love, courage and family. You are a Majestic avian creature. Soar above the clouds, discover hidden wonders, and rally against Darkness. During your adventure, you will delve through time and find yourself in a cozy narrative woven with love, friendship, and family.

  • Explore a beautiful world: Soar above the clouds, through lush forests, dive into pristine waters, and walk cobblestone streets

  • A touching and emotional story about Love, Courage and Family

  • Featuring a beautiful Cinematic Soundtrack

  • Capture Essence, Summon magical Wisps and find hidden Wonders

  • Enter Moments in Time: Delve through time, experience a changing landscape, and watch as pieces of the story unfold

    Immerse yourself in this emotional tale of two sisters and their fragile bond. Jess, the elder sibling, and Daisy both struggle to find their place in the world. Jess, emotionally shattered by the traumatic loss of her brother, withdraws from friends and family and is haunted by his ghostly apparition. The spectral presence of her brother, manifested as a wolf, bewilders her, leaving her to question her own sanity and emotional stability, trapping her in a turbulent maelstrom of madness and despair.

    Daisy, determined and resilient, yearns to maintain her bond with Jess, but her efforts are met with indifference. Driven to chart her own course, Daisy joins a guild where she swiftly rises through the ranks. Despite her success, she remains eager to rebuild her relationship with her reclusive sister. Her heart yearns not only to reunite with Jess but also to safeguard the world from the encroaching darkness that claimed her brother's life.

    Embark on a journey to help these sisters mend their fractured bond. As they are thrust into the eternal struggle between Light and Dark, your guidance becomes indispensable. Assist them as they assume pivotal roles in the battle against the consuming forces of darkness, rescuing both the mortal and spiritual realms from peril.

    This game builds upon the success of David's debut game, The Companion. This game has a strong focus on Story and Narrative and is accompanied with striking visuals, artistic style, cinematic score and high quality voice acting. This follow-up game will layer in more gameplay components such as action, puzzle and more expansive story.

    The Majestic takes place in the same universe as The Companion. However, playing The Companion is not a requirement to understand & enjoy this game to its fullest.
